name: Mountain Mayhem 3D
description:
Enter a new dimension of mayhem in the newest installment of the Mountain Mayhem franchise.

Made with raylib.

Source code

Controls:

  • Use left and right arrows to steer
  • R to restart
  • ESC to exit

Asset sources:

  • Mountain
  • Grass
  • Explosion
  • Space Madness
